data.name: ClearWater Plumbers
data.address: 6954 Boat Club Rd, Fort Worth, TX 76179

reviews.text:
We are Clearwater Plumbers customers for life; they're an absolutely incredible company that exudes top notch customer service. We've been using them for several years now, but our latest experience sealed the deal.

Recently we had them come out for a sewer pipe inspection from another plumbing company which provided us with a yearly scope of our line. They discovered a slab leak underneath our home due to a shifted sewer line. The estimate to fix the line was very high. We decided to get a sec

They were all so easy to work with,
Gary , Johnny and Andrew.
We had a big job, they did it in timely manner, were priced well and friendly.
My Aunt recommended them to me and I would recommend them in the future.
Thank you ClearWater Plumbers

Clearwater Plumbing is the Greatest!
They came out and did a lot of upgrades for us.
A new tall toilet ( just had hip replacement).
They installed 1/4 turn valves on all of our water supplies.  They flushed the tankless hot water heater that was installed by Clearwater  about a few years earlier. Now if there is a problem we can turn off the water.  Removing the plastic turn off valves that will break the first time they are used.  They upgraded all of the supply hoses under our sinks.
They have

JR and Wesley were fantastic. They conducted a very thorough safety inspection and answered all of my questions! I’ve had a few different plumbing companies come out in the last few days to provide estimates on a repair and by far I felt that JR’s attention to detail and explanation of things was above and beyond. Will definitely use this company again in the future!

Devon and Charlies replaced our 26 year old water softener after it died suddenly. They were professional and efficient. They also explained what needed to be done and the cost clearly before work was agreed upon to move forward. The system that Clearwater uses when scheduling their teams is fantastic and made me feel secure of exactly who I was supposed to be meeting and when they would arrive within my home. The work was also completed in a timely fashion, and they even went so far as to stop
We had the pleasure to work with Cory Reeves today. He was very professional, patient and helpful. Fixed our bathtub and gave us helpful tips. Would highly recommend ClearWater Plumbing.

When I called for an appointment, Katie, the secretary was friendly and very informative. And she set up an appointment accordingly. Connor and Payton were assigned to come unclog my bath drain, and they did an awesome job. They explained everything thoroughly where I understood. Their job was excellent. They were friendly informative And got the job done. I highly recommend this company and I would definitely recommend it to my family and friends. Bless you guys. You did an awesome job. And tha

I had concerns about a previous repair, and Tim came out to take a look. He quickly identified the issue and made the necessary repair on the spot. Tim was very patient, knowledgeable, and acted swiftly. I really appreciated his professionalism and thoroughness that was displayed throughout the entire process. Highly recommend! Thank you Tim !!
The two young men that came to my house were wonderful! They went above and beyond to get my hot water heater installed. Elliot was my technician. He was polite as was his assistant.

Jeff and Payton came to assess the problem with my old water heater, which they did. They answered all my questions and offered a plan to install a new one. They were professional and courteous and did a great job in installing the new appliance. The showed a high degree of knowledge about the whole process and were timely with the whole process. I will recommend them in the future if the opportunity comes up. Thanks Jeff and Payton.

Clearwater plumbing is the ONLY plumbers I trust to call. They have literally been a lifeline to my house.
I had a literal pool of water under my home that caused damage to my foundation and Clearwater came found where the pipe was leaking and found out the flipper I bought my home from literally wrapped a leak with electrical tape ( thank you Corey for being awesome ! )
Then I called them again  because after I fixed the foundation I had yet another leak !
I had got a camera inspection from a p

ClearWater Plumbers have always been awesome in taking care of whatever plumbing issues we have with precision and accuracy. We live in an older house and have had a lot of plumbing issues. They do the little extra things like making sure their shoes are clean and they always leave the space clean whenever they are done. Which is awesome because plumbing is messy work! I would definitely recommend ClearWater Plumbers for all your plumbing needs!

JR and Payton were absolutely phenomenal!!! Provided excellent communication, were very courteous, and listened to all my concerns. Never pushed anything unnecessary and were great overall! I could tell they were both passionate in what they do. Would highly recommend both and ClearWater Plumbers!!!

Johnnie and Devon were absolutely incredible! Very clear and concise in their estimates, and did a wonderful job in connecting with their customer. I will absolutely be having them out for any other plumbing issues! 10/10!

After a home inspection the Inspector forgot to flip 2 switches back on. On a brief first inspection by Devon, the switches were missed. After giving me my initial estimate of $800 he came back later and let me know everything was actually working fine when he discovered the 2 switches the Inspector failed to place back in the on position. A $42 trip charge was my fee for the visit. This made my day.  I appreciate the honesty and great service. I have used Clearwater Plumbing for the last 8 year

Bryson and Braydon were some of the nicest folks to ever come do a service request for our home.  They were thorough making sure they found the root cause of our issue and even double checked a few things to make sure nothing was missing for the solution. Hope I don't have to call a plumber for issues, but if I did, I would call these guys up before anyone else.

Clearwater installed a water softener and reverse osmosis system in our home. They were courteous and professional at every step of the process from the initial quote to explaining the system when the install was completed. I recommend them and would not hesitate to do business with them in the future.

Jason and his teammate provided exemplary customer service in repairing an outside faucet leak! Highly recommend doing business with Clearwater Plumbers. Identified the problem and fixed it in less than an hour with minimal damage to the brick. Friendly and efficient! Would highly recommend this company and they will be the only plumbers I will ever call for my home and my family's homes!

Clearwater plumbers are absolutely professional and provide a great value. I would highly recommend them. They're pricing was fair (well below their competitors), the guys were professional and on time, and they went above and beyond  answering my questions, doing clean work and providing me with everything I needed. Beyond impressed.

First service call today with Clearwater Plumbers. Call was scheduled for tomorrow but the company was able to move me up a day. Devon and his colleague were very professional and explained everything they were about to do. I felt the pricing of the work was very fair. No complaints, very satisfied and will be using them again. Bonus points for being dog-friendly 💜.

Conner and Andrew did an outstanding job at my home. They had to cut into Sheetrock to find a leak. They cut into the Sheetrock in a closet so the hole was not visible in the main
house. Very much appreciated. They cleaned up before they left. They were polite and explained everything to me. I will definitely call them for future plumbing issues.

Our family had a PHENOMENAL experience with this great business. Jacob and Wesley blessed our family and home so much. It was a miracle. We recommend these AMAZING people and business. God bless them all!

My wife and I were horrified to learn that part of the cast iron pipe beneath our slab had failed, and that the pipe had been blocked by dirt and rocks beneath our foundation. The joy of owning an older home!

We received quotes from three different plumbing companies, one of which insisted on cutting up our bamboo floors and cutting a 3'x3' hold in our foundation to diagnose the issue. Had we done that, they would have destroyed our floors, displaced us from our home—and, ultimately, had to per

Clearwater Plumbers is a great company to call when you have plumbing needs.  My technicians today were Jeff and Johnny and they were both personable, professional, efficient, and easy to work with. My new water heater was installed same day, and the old one was hauled off.

We have used Clearwater many times before for our personal home as well as our rental properties. This time Connor was the one helping us with our issue. As a realtor I work with many licensed trades on a regular basis. However, he went above and beyond on this job and I was very impressed.  He offered continued communication as I was not able to be there during all of the work, but he kept me up to date on what was found, options we had discussed and photos and videos once completed. He really
Conner and his team were great! Got the job done quickly and displayed considerable attention to detail. Will definitely keep them in mind if we need anything done in the future.

Dear Clearwater Plumbers Team,

I just wanted to take a moment to express my sincere appreciation for the incredible service I received. From start to finish, your team demonstrated true professionalism, expertise, and a level of customer care that’s hard to come by these days.

Every interaction was friendly, efficient, and informative. The work was done with care, precision, and respect for my home, and the results exceeded my expectations. It’s clear that your team takes great pride in what y

We are members of Clearwater Plumbers Otter Club and it has paid off every year.  Recently, we had Charles and Elliot come out to perform a hydro cleaning of our lines and they were very pleasant to deal with.  Both of them answered all of our questions thoroughly and they are true professionals.  Shout out to Coral and Candice on the phones too because they are super friendly all the time.

Cory and Shane we amazing! We had issues with sewage backing up into our house for a week! They found the issue in under an hour. There were tree roots growing completely through our sewer main. They cleared the tree roots and found a gap in our were pipe it was completely disconnected. They did a spot pipe fix and ensured it would be fixed and completed the next day. They were amazing! They took care of us so fast since we live in an HOA so the excavation was fast as well. If we have any issues

Andrew and his Lead JR were fantastic! They had to leave and go get the part to replace and they were so fast. They left the area clean and they were polite ,quick and clean ! When else can you ask for in a service visit ! Great all the way around

Javier and Josh came out on a Sunday to fix a gas leak issue I was having. They figured out the problem and got it taken care of quickly! Appreciated them coming out on a Sunday and for the peace of mind.
Conner and Isaac from ClearWater Plumbers repaired the irrigation pipeline in my front yard and also fixed my bathroom faucet. They were knowledgeable, friendly, and efficient. Highly recommend!

Our plumbers were phenomenal and went above and beyond to clear construction debris that was lodged in our pipe causing a blockage.  They were very friendly and kept us informed of progress long the way.

Gary and Taylor did amazing job sending me videos and talking there way through the videos as they see things that are not correct and making suggestions along the way through the video. These 2 gentlemen are very professional all the time on site.  If we purchase this home they will always be ask for personally when we need service.
Thank you guys
Roy Jenkins.

Connor and Cody from ClearWater Plumbers  assisted my sister and me yesterday promptly and expertly with a faucet leak. (We had difficulty with another source earlier who were unable to resolve the issue.) These gentlemen corrected the problem within minutes. They were kind, courteous and professional. My sister and I sincerely thank you each of you for a job well done.
Clearwater is the best!  JR and Taylor are great to work with and all around good guys.  Very pleased with the service we received.
My wife and I would recommend this company to anyone. Jeff and Joseph came out same day and fixed the issue in 20 mins. I hope we don’t need them but we’d definitely use them again 10/10
Clearwater is our go to company! Trustworthy and get the job done. Jeff did a great job today, professional, & knowledgeable. Thank you.

JR and Caleb installed my new water heater and did a great job. They were efficient, courteous and friendly. And they completed the job just in time to watch the total solar eclipse! We had so much fun watching together. I’ll bet none of us forget it. Thank you, Clear Water, for your usual great customer service.

Very impressed with Clearwater plumbing!! Corey, Brandon and Shane did an outstanding job remodeling our shower! They were quick, prompt, knowledgeable and very friendly!! Will definitely be using them for any future plumbing needs and recommending to friends!!

Conner & Johnny were very pleasant & were able
to get the problem fixed in a timely manner. They did an excellent job.

Cory, Brandon and Andy from Clearwater Plumbers solved our AC Condenser line problem.   They presented several options for me to choose, and completed the work quickly and professionally.   Highly recommended.

Good men, good work, seemed a little high priced but all seemed to be done well. Neat and no mess.
Very pleasant to work with.
Connor did a great job with an outside leak. Assessed the damage, cut up concrete, found and fixed the leak. Very thorough and easy to work with. Will use Clearwater Plumbing for any future issues.

I can’t say enough about this company.  From start to finish, everyone was so helpful.  I know they all must be top notch, but make sure you ask for JR if you get the chance. He is very knowledgeable, patient and kind.  Thanks for coming today.

Our technician JR and Cade were thorough and checked many things. They were polite and personable. We had our tankless water heater serviced and since we had never owned a tankless one, he gave us lots of valuable information about them. Loved how they used vinegar instead of chemicals to flush!!! The reviews for this company are legitimate. Plumbers have a reputation for gauging the consumer because they are over a barrel and they were honest, very reasonably priced for the work they did snd th

I highly recommend ClearWater Plumbers! I don’t want to dive into too much detail about our housing problems, but I will say after using another well known plumber and getting ripped off with costs and poor quality of work ClearWater plumbers really came through drastically. Here are my pros and cons:

1. Great customer service : Professional, clear, and thorough communication with Haley, Misty, and Luke. They follow up after every appointment to make sure everything was understandable.

2. Grea

Jeff and Bradon were very professional and courteous they explained everything they did in detail and showed the work after it was completed I would definitely and strongly recommend them to anyone and everyone for sure

Stellar experience. The pros are courteous and helpful. They explain the issue in plain language using photos and provided multiple solution options. They were incredibly considerate of our home and left the job site clean.

Called for the “special” drain cleaning listed on their website, was told the fee is only for looking at the drain, even though the ad on the website says the fee includes clearing the clog. At least they let me know upfront, (they got an extra star for that).
